about_the_game:
It Belongs in a Museum is a Rogue-lite, treasure hunting, artifact collection VR story game. Join a shadow organization and help its weakened, resurrected goddess search for magic treasures to undue the curse they unleashed in procedural dungeons, tombs, lost cities, and ancient ruins.

This is a demo of the initial training level. you start with a lot of money and can try out the weapons, kill monsters, collect some treasures, talk to the skeleton NPC and finally return to the main menu. pretty amazing stuff. Got anything to drink?
